verses.verse: אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am הַגֶּ֙בֶר֙ <S%H1397><s%> hag-Ge-ver I [am] the man רָאָ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> ra-'Ah [that] hath seen עֳנִ֔י <S%H6040><s%> 'o-Ni, affliction בְּשֵׁ֖בֶט <S%H7626><s%> be-She-vet by the rod עֶבְרָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5678><s%> ev-ra-To. of his wrath
